item.title: About Me
item.description:
I am a passionate mobile developer. I graduated in Computer Science from √âcole Polytechnique and T√©l√©com ParisTech in 2010.

I am interested in numerous topics, from cross-platform mobile development to image processing and computer vision (I also hold a master’s degree in medical imaging from Universit√© Pierre et Marie Curie).

Experience

Late 2016 - Lead Mobile Developer (iOS, Android) at Baatch

Baatch is a new startup whose team is composed of talented people. Our product has not been made public yet. ü§ê

2015 - Senior Software Engineer (iOS, Android) at The Grizzly Labs

The Grizzly Labs are developing mobile apps, including Genius Scan [iOS - Android], a smart mobile scanner (20M users).

I worked on their existing apps for both Android and iOS, and developed Genius Sign [iOS] and Pyfl [iOS].

2011 - Senior Software Engineer (iOS, Android, Ruby on Rails) at Applidium

Applidium is a mobile agency based in Paris. They brought VLC and Vim to iOS and hacked into Siri. I was the manager of a small team of developers and the lead developer of several apps, including:

  • myCANAL [iOS]
  • CANALPLAY [iOS]
  • RATP [iOS]
  • Radio France [Android]
